page.title: 06A SCHOOL DAY
page.content: The day starts with assembly.We sit in class lines and years.The headmaster headmaster comes in and we sing a hymn and listen to a story sometimes out of the Bible.Then we have another hymn before we go to class.In the morning we have Mathematics we use a scheme called Fletcher Mathematics and we study Arithmetic,decimals,length,money Weight,Fractions,Shape and Time. Then we have playtime for 15 minutes. We can buy milk which is 7 pence a carton.After play we have English, English lessons include,sentence work story,spelling Comprehension and handwriting.Dinner time is at 12 noon. Some people go home for dinner and the rest have hot dinner or sandwiches. Dinner time ends at 1.25pm.After dinner we have music,topic,religious education and games.School ends at 3.45pm RACHEL,HAYLEY, aged 10
